content:
DINE

Spontaneous combustion – second-floor rooftop deck, fire pits, and smooth beat in Bakersfield’s hippest lounge. Climb those stairs early to reserve the cabana… urban nightlife was never so cool. So pull up a chair, get close to the fire, no worries here… it’s a wildfire.

PLAY

Are you sure you’re still in Bakersfield? Climb those stairs early to reserve the cabana… Take advantage of a bit of decadence, a personal waiter to serve your meals waits for the cue. This is NOT your mom’s Saturday afternoon picnic…

Every Night is Game Night!
Bring your friends and get competitive with giant yard games!

Relax With a Drink in Hand!
Choose from a menu of refreshing cocktails, frozen drinks, carafes of sangria, and buckets of craft beers

Tailgate Parties
Cheer on your favorite team on the big screen! Enjoy happy hour specials and live grill stations every game day throughout the season.

VIEW MENU
